contentions.content: This is not the fortune you are looking for.
You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.
A crow perched himself on a telephone wire.  He was going to make a long-distance caw.
A domineering man married a mere wisp of a girl.  He came back from his honeymoon a chastened man.  He'd become aware of the will of the wisp.
A farm in the country side had several turkeys, it was known as the house of seven gobbles.
A man who keeps stealing mopeds is an obvious cycle-path.
You will not win the lottery today.
Your best friend is never gonna give you up.
NYAN NYAN NYAN!
Today, JavaScript is going to call back.
Always respect Research when it is set In Motion.
BlackBerries are so much better than blueberries.
Someone is wrong on the internet!
Your lucky number today is 42. For obvious reasons.
Too much coffee will keep you awake.
Productivity is the cornerstone of getting things done.
Do not make a habit of forgoing sleep for work.
BlackBerry 10 is a success.
This device is a much better choice than *those other platforms*.
BlackBerry 10. Making your inbox proud.
Think twice before taking the advice of an app.
This fortune will only come true after a meal.
Only you can stop forest fires.
I'm sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't do that.
Backup your files.
Perhaps it is time to get back to work.
ALL THE FORTUNES!
{"error":"lol no fortune for you"} (you just got JSON'd)
Apples are overrated.
Android sometimes dream of eletric sheep.
Swipe up and close this app now.
Don't look now, but I think you're being followed.
Be happy.
BlackBerry is gonna keep on loving you.
Keep calm.
Contain your excitement.
Today is a good day.
You are going to run into someone today.
Expand on your hobby.
Take that money and save it!
The world looks different through someone else's glasses.
The answer to life, the universe, and everything is 42.
Don't quit your day job.
A BlackBerry a day is not enough for you.
